text: Roger Andrew Taylor is an English musical artist, well known as the drummer of new wave band Duran Duran. ==Discography== ===with Duran Duran=== * Duran Duran (1981) * Rio (1982) * Seven and the Ragged Tiger (1983) * Thank You (1995) [drums on two songs: "Perfect Day" and "Watching the Detectives"] * Astronaut (2004) * Reportage (2006) (unreleased) * Red Carpet Massacre (2007) * All You Need Is Now (2010) * Paper Gods (2015) * Future Past (2021) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Duran Duran website Category:1960 births Category:English drummers Category:Musicians from Birmingham Category:Duran Duran members Category:Living people
title: Roger Taylor (Duran Duran drummer)
